001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.time.ZoneId;
005
006import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
007
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig.Provider;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.ConvertParameter;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.KeyParameter;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.PassThroughParameter;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
017import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
018import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
019
020/**
021 * Configures Logback style pattern encoders and offers provision with the URI scheme
022 * {@value PatternEncoder#PATTERN_SCHEME}.
023 */
024@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
025public final class PatternConfigurator implements Configurator {
026
027        /**
028         * For service loader to call.
029         */
030        public PatternConfigurator() {
031                // for service loader.
032        }
033
034        @Override
035        public boolean configure(LogConfig config) {
036                var compiler = compiler(config);
037                config.encoderRegistry().register(PatternEncoder.PATTERN_SCHEME, new PatternEncoderProvider(compiler, config));
038                return true;
039        }
040
041        static PatternCompiler compiler(LogConfig config) {
042                var registry = config.serviceRegistry().putIfAbsent(PatternRegistry.class, () -> PatternRegistry.of());
043                boolean ansiDisable = LogProperties.Property.builder() //
044                        .toBoolean() //
045                        .orElse(false) //
046                        .build(LogProperties.GLOBAL_ANSI_DISABLE_PROPERTY) //
047                        .get(config.properties()) //
048                        .value();
049                var patternConfig = config.serviceRegistry().putIfAbsent(PatternConfig.class, () -> {
050                        var b = PatternConfig.builder().fromProperties(config.properties());
051                        if (ansiDisable) {
052                                b.ansiDisabled(true);
053                        }
054                        return b.build();
055                });
056                var compiler = config.serviceRegistry()
057                        .putIfAbsent(PatternCompiler.class, () -> new Compiler(registry, patternConfig));
058                return compiler;
059        }
060
061        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternEncoderBuilder", prefix = LogProperties.ENCODER_PREFIX)
062        static Provider<LogEncoder> provideEncoder(@KeyParameter String name, String pattern,
063                        @PassThroughParameter @Nullable PatternCompiler patternCompiler) {
064                return (n, config) -> {
065                        var compiler = patternCompiler;
066                        if (compiler == null) {
067                                compiler = PatternConfigurator.compiler(config);
068                        }
069                        return LogEncoder.of(compiler.compile(pattern));
070                };
071        }
072
073        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternConfigBuilder", prefix = PatternConfig.PATTERN_CONFIG_PREFIX)
074        static PatternConfig provideFormatterConfig(@ConvertParameter("convertZoneId") @Nullable ZoneId zoneId,
075                        @Nullable String lineSeparator, @Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled) {
076                PatternConfig dc = PatternConfig.of();
077                ansiDisabled = ansiDisabled == null ? dc.ansiDisabled() : ansiDisabled;
078                lineSeparator = lineSeparator == null ? dc.lineSeparator() : lineSeparator;
079                return new SimpleFormatterConfig(zoneId, lineSeparator, ansiDisabled);
080
081        }
082
083        static ZoneId convertZoneId(@Nullable String zoneId) {
084                var dc = PatternConfig.of();
085                ZoneId zoneId_ = zoneId == null ? dc.zoneId() : ZoneId.of(zoneId);
086                return zoneId_;
087        }
088
089}
090
091record PatternEncoderProvider(PatternCompiler compiler, LogConfig config) implements LogEncoder.EncoderProvider {
092
093        @Override
094        public LogEncoder provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) {
095                PatternEncoderBuilder b = new PatternEncoderBuilder(name);
096                String prefix = b.propertyPrefix();
097                LogProperties combined = LogProperties.of(uri, prefix, properties);
098                b.fromProperties(combined);
099                return b.build().provide(name, config);
100        }
101
102}
